credit_line: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline E. Greenleaf
title: Man's hat
medium:
Medium: silk, silver foil on silk core, flat silver foil
Technique: embroidered
description: Yellow taffeta cap made up of four panels and deep turn-over border, each panel in crown and border embroidered with symmetrical chinoiserie floral sprays in silks in shades of blue in satin stitch and silver threads in satin and boucle stitch.  Edged up four seams and along top of border with silver metal bobbin lace.
name: Man's hat
